nodes.text: Lara was a member of a species that possessed fur who was a student of a school on the planet Merokia alongside the Force-sensitive Karr Nuq Sin during the time of the New Republic. At the age of thirteen years old, Lara's adult coat of fur started to grow in.
Lara was first mentioned in the novel Force Collector, written by Kevin Shinick and published in 2019.
